rotate_wheel.description: Rotate the wheel of the chair to change direction.

clean_wheel.description: Clean the wheel to increase smoothness.

clean_seat.description: Clean the seat for hygiene purposes.

rotate_seat.description: Rotate the seat to adjust the position.

clean_chair_leg.description: Clean the chair leg to make it more presentable.

statuscheck_chair_leg.description: Check the status of the chair leg for any maintenance requirement.

clean_entire_chair.description: Clean the entire chair including the wheel, seat, and chair leg.
